analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0x9d94d1932a62185d0ac8e7f8c22d0eaa802f32e1.sol#236-238) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/24/0x9d94d1932a62185d0ac8e7f8c22d0eaa802f32e1.sol#238)

AllowanceCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0x9d94d1932a62185d0ac8e7f8c22d0eaa802f32e1.sol#314-322) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/24/0x9d94d1932a62185d0ac8e7f8c22d0eaa802f32e1.sol#319-321)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/24/0x9d94d1932a62185d0ac8e7f8c22d0eaa802f32e1.sol#343-352) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/24/0x9d94d1932a62185d0ac8e7f8c22d0eaa802f32e1.sol#346-347)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/24/0x9d94d1932a62185d0ac8e7f8c22d0eaa802f32e1.sol#356-364) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/24/0x9d94d1932a62185d0ac8e7f8c22d0eaa802f32e1.sol#357-360)
